PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-04592020-06-17,  ,  ,  ECCC,  , 
ActMigratory Birds Convention Act, 1994
SubjectRegulations Amending the Migratory Birds Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the MIGRATORY BIRDS REGULATIONS in order to (1) help ensure the sustainable hunting of migratory game birds, as well as to mitigate negative impacts of overabundant species on wildlife, the environment, and the health, safety and economy for human communities, by modifying certain hunting season dates, daily bag limits and possession limits for the 2020-2021 and 2021-2022 hunting seasons; and (2) ensure Canada meets its obligations under the Migratory Birds Convention.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0133 Publication Date: 2020-07-08
AttachmentsAttachment
